string.text: Standard AA battery. Commonly used by stalkers to power various devices throughout the Zone.

A metal fastener in the form of a rod with external threading and a hexagonal wrench head. Used by stalkers for detecting, marking boundaries, and discharging anomalies, as well as for mine detection.
A common repair kit, Allows to fix equipment.

Adjusts visibility distance multiplier for current weather profile. Example: with weather visibility at 150m, minimum slider shows 60m, maximum shows 225m.\n \n %c[pda_yellow] Х Performance impact: Medium
Controls detail level for character, monster and weapon models. Higher values increase visual fidelity.\n \n %c[pda_green] Х Performance impact: Low
Adjusts grass density. Higher values create thicker vegetation clusters.\n \n %c[pda_red] Х Performance impact: High
Sets maximum grass render distance. WARNING! Performance drops exponentially with increased radius. Recommended range: 150-200m.\n \n %c[pda_red] Х Performance impact: High
Controls texture detail level. Higher values preserve sharpness but require more VRAM.\n \n %c[pda_yellow] Х Performance impact: Medium
Adjusts anisotropic filtering quality for distant textures.\n \n %c[pda_green] Х Performance impact: Low
Toggles bullet impact marks on bodies.\n \n %c[pda_green] Х Performance impact: Low
Toggles object shadows from sunlight. Disabling may boost performance on low-end PCs.\n \n %c[pda_yellow] Х Performance impact: Medium
Enables grass shadows from sunlight/dynamic lights. WARNING! Extremely demanding - avoid combining with high grass settings!\n \n %c[pda_red] Х Performance impact: VERY HIGH
Maintains lighting calculation accuracy over distance. Higher values preserve shadow detail at range.\n \n %c[pda_green] Х Performance impact: Low
Toggles volumetric light processing for NPC flashlights. Disabling helps performance in NPC-heavy night areas.\n \n %c[pda_yellow] Х Performance impact: Medium
Adjusts shadow edge smoothness quality.\n \n %c[pda_green] Х Performance impact: Low
Synchronizes framerate to monitor refresh rate. Eliminates screen tearing but may reduce performance.\n \n %c[pda_green] Х Performance impact: Low
Forces 60Hz refresh rate. Only enable if game incorrectly detects your monitor's refresh rate. May cause fullscreen lag in rare cases.\n \n %c[pda_green] Х Performance impact: Low
Selects additional anti-aliasing method. Works alongside (or instead of) MSAA.\n \n %c[pda_green] Х Performance impact: Low

Selects sunshaft rendering type:
 
 %c[pda_green] Х Screen Space: Low impact
 %c[pda_red] Х Volumetric: High impact
 %c[pda_red] Х Combined: High impact
Softens water edges with transparency gradient, eliminating harsh shoreline transitions.\n \n %c[pda_green] Х Performance impact: Low
Improves fire/smoke/explosion visuals. Recommended to keep enabled.\n \n %c[pda_green] Х Performance impact: Low
Simulates real-world ambient occlusion with subtle shadows in geometric crevices.\n \n %c[pda_green] Х Performance impact: Low
Selects ambient occlusion implementation method.\n \n %c[pda_yellow] Х Performance impact: Medium
Enhances surface relief details using ray-traced heightmap calculations.\n \n %c[pda_green] Х Performance impact: Low
Simulates real-time eye focus depth effects.\n \n %c[pda_green] Х Performance impact: Low
Enables microsurface detail rendering on objects.\n \n %c[pda_green] Х Performance impact: Low
Toggles light bulb lens flares.\n \n %c[pda_green] Х Performance impact: Low
Simulates raindrops on helmet/visor surfaces during rain.\n \n %c[pda_green] Х Performance impact: Low
Enables dynamic rain wetness effects on surfaces.\n \n %c[pda_green] Х Performance impact: Low
Enables volumetric lighting for certain lamps.\n \n %c[pda_yellow] Х Performance impact: Medium
Adjusts water/wet surface reflection quality.\n \n %c[pda_yellow] Х Performance impact: Medium
Simulates volumetric fog for murky water/lowland haze effects.\n \n %c[pda_green] Х Performance impact: Low
Toggles player character shadow.\n \n %c[pda_green] Х Performance impact: Low
Higher shadow map resolution preserves detail at distance. Recommended minimum: 4096x4096. Extremely performance-heavy.\n \n %c[pda_red] Х Performance impact: VERY HIGH
Enables multi-threaded texture loading. May reduce save load times on SSDs.\n \n %c[pda_green] Х Performance impact: Low
Adjust viewing angle. Recommended to increase for ultrawide monitors.\n \n %c[pda_green] Х Performance impact: Low
Adjusts weapon view distance. Lower values (?0.45) bring weapons closer, higher values (?0.65) push them back. Tune according to monitor/FOV preferences.\n \n %c[pda_green] Х Performance impact: Low
Sets MSAA multiplier. WARNING! High values significantly impact performance. Recommended: 4x.\n \n %c[pda_red] Х Performance impact: High
Adjusts grass height.\n \n %c[pda_green] Х Performance impact: Low
Locks sun shadows in fixed position regardless of time of day. May boost FPS on weak systems.\n \n %c[pda_green] Х Performance impact: Low
Configures lens flare behavior for light sources.\n \n %c[pda_green] Х Performance impact: Low
Forcibly disables bump mapping. Reduces geometry quality but may improve performance.\n \n %c[pda_green] Х Performance impact: Low
Adjusts sun rendering quality.\n \n %c[pda_yellow] Х Performance impact: Medium
Adjusts sunbeam rendering quality.\n \n %c[pda_yellow] Х Performance impact: Medium
Sets reflection render distance. Recommended range: 300-500m.\n \n %c[pda_red] Х Performance impact: High
Enables geometry subdivision for smoother surfaces.\n \n %c[pda_yellow] Х Performance impact: Medium
Selects lowland fog implementation: Native G.S.W.R. or Screen Space Shaders version.\n \n %c[pda_green] Х Performance impact: Low
Toggles 3D weapon scopes. Doesn't affect vanilla weapons.\n \n %c[pda_red] Х Performance impact: High
Toggles 3D PDA rendering.\n \n %c[pda_green] Х Performance impact: Low
Toggles screen edge darkening effect.\n \n %c[pda_green] Х Performance impact: Low
Toggles dynamic helmet/visor glass effects.\n \n %c[pda_green] Х Performance impact: Low
Toggles screen-based status effects (red edges when injured, darkening when exhausted etc.)\n \n %c[pda_green] Х Performance impact: Low
Toggles shader-based night vision effect. Disabling reverts to vanilla implementation.\n \n %c[pda_green] Х Performance impact: Low
Toggles motion blur during rapid camera movements.\n \n %c[pda_green] Х Performance impact: Low
Adjusts motion blur intensity during rapid movements.\n \n %c[pda_green] Х Performance impact: Low

Optimizes static geometry (level assets). Significantly reduces visual quality by culling distant geometry, but may help performance on low-end PCs. Slider controls draw distance - higher values mean closer culling. Set to 0 to disable.\n \n %c[pda_green] Х Performance impact: Low
Optimizes dynamic geometry (crates, barrels, NPCs etc.). Slider controls draw distance - higher values mean closer culling. Set to 0 to disable.\n \n %c[pda_green] Х Performance impact: Low
Toggles shadow optimization.\n \n %c[pda_green] Х Performance impact: Low
Adjusts red channel intensity for color correction.\n \n %c[pda_green] Х Performance impact: Low
Adjusts green channel intensity for color correction.\n \n %c[pda_green] Х Performance impact: Low
Adjusts blue channel intensity for color correction.\n \n %c[pda_green] Х Performance impact: Low
Adjusts color saturation for color correction.\n \n %c[pda_green] Х Performance impact: Low
Selects lighting type. Static lighting suits low-end PCs, dynamic lighting works better on powerful systems.
Selects preconfigured settings preset. Higher settings may reduce performance. Manual tuning recommended.
Sets game screen resolution. Recommended to match your monitor's native resolution.
Sets maximum simultaneous sound sources. Higher values reduce audio clipping in areas with many sounds (typically anomaly fields).
Toggles 3D audio effects. When enabled, some locations will feature echo effects.
Toggles dynamic combat music that plays during enemy encounters.
Toggles distance-based audio delay. Distant sounds will take longer to reach the player.
Preloads all sound assets at game launch. Increases loading time to main menu but reduces in-game stuttering during NPC interactions.
When enabled, crosshair dynamically resizes based on target distance.
Toggles advanced crosshair that follows weapon barrel movements.
Toggles weapon collision. When enabled, your character will automatically adjust weapon position near obstacles.
Toggles corpse collision. When enabled, bodies become physical obstacles. WARNING: May cause pathfinding issues in tight spaces.
Simulates movement inertia - camera continues slightly forward when stopping before returning to neutral position.
Sets maximum quick saves count. Above 0 creates numbered saves. When limit reached, oldest saves get overwritten. Recommended to set as high as possible.
Enables grass displacement by characters.\n \n %c[pda_green] Х Performance impact: Low
Toggles chromatic aberration effect.\n \n %c[pda_green] Х Performance impact: Low
Toggles film grain effect.\n \n %c[pda_green] Х Performance impact: Low
Enables Screen Space Shaders addon.\n \n %c[pda_red] Х Performance impact: High
Smooths sky textures for cleaner color transitions.\n \n %c[pda_green] Х Performance impact: Low
Improves lighting interactions with bushes/branches/grass and fixes visual artifacts.\n \n %c[pda_green] Х Performance impact: Low
Enables lowland fog from Screen Space Shaders.\n \n %c[pda_green] Х Performance impact: Low
Enables light that bounces off surfaces to illuminate surroundings.\n \n %c[pda_green] Х Performance impact: Low
Adds shadows to weapons and small details.\n \n %c[pda_green] Х Performance impact: Low
Enables shadow offset from Screen Space Shaders 19.\n \n %c[pda_green] Х Performance impact: Low
Enables SSS19 wind effects on vegetation. Disables Advanced X-Ray's native wind when active.\n \n %c[pda_green] Х Performance impact: Low
Toggles dynamic rain puddles from Screen Space Shaders.\n \n %c[pda_yellow] Х Performance impact: Medium
Enables light diffusion effect from SSS Update 22, creating realistic glow around bright objects.\n \n %c[pda_green] Х Performance impact: Low
Adds dust/dirt texture layer to bloom effects. Only active when wearing a helmet with dynamic HUD enabled.\n \n %c[pda_green] Х Performance impact: Low
ƒанна€ опци€ включает аддон Enhanced Shaders. \n \n %c[pda_yellow] Х Ќагрузка: —редн€€
This option allows to customize the camera behaviour at player's death.
This option enhances game graphics for greater realism and visual appeal.\n \n %c[pda_yellow] Х Performance impact: Medium
This option adjusts the radius of wet surface effects during rain.\n \n %c[pda_yellow] Х Performance impact: Medium
Enables pseudo PBR implementation. Creates attractive texture highlights, though results may vary.\n \n %c[pda_yellow] Х Performance impact: Medium

ACES Tonemap - an image processing technique that mimics human visual perception of light and color. Creates more dynamic, wider color gamut, especially in high-contrast scenes with extreme brightness variations. Enhances realism and visual appeal while improving overall gaming experience.\n \n %c[pda_green] Х Performance impact: Low
Caps maximum framerate for more stable performance. Reduces hardware strain and system resource usage, ensuring smoother gameplay.

Limits maximum fog distance in weather systems. Boosts performance while naturally obscuring level boundaries not designed for extended visibility ranges.\n \n %c[pda_yellow] Х Performance impact: Medium

A simple metal box with thick walls padded with foam and a heavy, rubber-sealed lid. Designed specifically for transporting artifacts. The special solution inside suppresses the artifactТs anomalous energy, while the lead lining and airtight seal block all harmful radiation, ensuring user safety. However, since it cannot be attached to a belt, it neutralizes both the beneficial and detrimental effects of artifacts.
A reliable companion for those who value precision and dependability in the art of marksmanship.
This option allows you to adjust the rendering radius of grass shadows. Lowering the value may improve FPS to some extent. %c[pda_yellow] Х Performance impact: Medium
